import XAxisHiddenGraph from '../../../example/Graphs-Carbon/General/Axes/XAxisHidden?dev-site-example';

import YAxisHiddenGraphConfig from '@cerner/terra-graphs-docs/lib/example-datasets/graphConfigObjects/Line/lineDefault.js?dev-site-codeblock';
require('details-polyfill');

# Axis hidden

Axis hidden contains simple graph examples with hidden x and y axes.

## Getting Started

- Install with [npmjs](https://www.npmjs.com):
  - `npm i @cerner/carbon-graphs --save-dev`

## Usage
```js
import Carbon from '@cerner/carbon-graphs/dist/js/carbon-graphs.js';
import '@cerner/carbon-graphs/dist/css/carbon-graphs.css';
```

## Examples

<b>Data used for X-Axis hidden</b>
</summary>
